errors.error_description: References a non-existent configuration file path /usr/local/scvelo/config.yaml that users need to install
correction_candidates: Remove the note about the configuration file entirely as it's not needed

Replace with instructions to download config from the GitHub repository
errors.golden_answer: Remove the note about the configuration file entirely as it's not needed
